definition: (of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

combining native and foreign methods (idiom); sophisticated and many-sided
to combine traditional Chinese and Western medicine

sentences.english: It had the spiral structure revealed by congo red.
sentences.chinese: 具有與剛果紅結合的螺旋結構。

sentences.english: It is often combined with elements of numerology .
sentences.chinese: 通常，風水還與佔數學的原理結合起來使用。

sentences.english: Combination oiled nubuck leather upper with textile fabric accents.
sentences.chinese: 結合上油紡織面料口音磨砂皮革鞋面。

sentences.english: Damon combines his moviemaking talents with his desire to help others.
sentences.chinese: 戴蒙將製作電影的才能和幫助他人的慾望結合在一起。

sentences.english: So how can engineers balance the conflicting demands?
sentences.chinese: 工程師們如何尋找其中矛盾的結合點呢？

sentences.english: The double bond is attacked by the oxygen, forming aldehydes and carbonyls.
sentences.chinese: 雙結合受氧的攻擊形成乙醛和碳酸基。

sentences.english: In combination with the above, solar evacuated tubes provide for the domestic hot water needs.
sentences.chinese: 結合上述，採用太陽能真空集熱管爲家裏提供熱水。

sentences.english: Firstly, poetry is the product of combining poetry and music from the origin.
sentences.chinese: 第一，詩歌從本源上講是詩樂結合的產物。

sentences.english: The software is mainly programmed by C-Language, and partly by built-in Assembler-Language.
sentences.chinese: 系統軟件以C語言爲主體，結合內嵌彙編語言。

sentences.english: Shared laughter creates a bond of friendships.
sentences.chinese: 分享歡笑創造友誼的結合力。

sentences.english: The authors have designed the casting process of the housing part from a factory.
sentences.chinese: 並結合工廠管卡零件進行了鑄造工藝輔助設計。

sentences.english: The extracted oriental and occidental essence is embodied by a combination of undecorated quality and fashionable elements.
sentences.chinese: 提煉中西精華，不經裝飾的特質與時尚元素相結合。

sentences.english: Often students will band together to try to escape the Battleground.
sentences.chinese: 經常，學生會結合在一起試圖從戰場從逃出去。

sentences.english: This paper analyzes the X-ray diagnosis of 7 cases of milky renal stone.
sentences.chinese: 結合7例腎鈣乳，就x線診斷問題進行了討論。

sentences.english: The object-oriented logical program design may unify these two kind of designs the merit.
sentences.chinese: 面向對象的邏輯程序設計可結合這兩種設計的優點。

sentences.english: Methods 3 cases of mesonephric adenocarcinoma of the bladder were reviewed with review of the literature.
sentences.chinese: 方法總結3例病人資料，結合文獻複習討論。

to pass through/to penetrate/by means of/via
